bio: "If you have an apple and I have an apple and we exchange these apples then you and I will still each have one apple. But if you have an idea and I have an idea and we exchange these ideas, then each of us will have two ideas." SpazioZoneModa Grafica e Comunicazione web 2.0 Magistrale Moda Rimini - ZoneModa Coordinamento didattico, Grafica e Comunicazione web 2.0 reedo.org Progettazione della Grafica, Comunicazione integrata e web 2.0
